page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: St. Mary, Little Sampford is the only church in the survey area.Many people of other denominations,therefore necessarily attend churches and chapels which are outside the area.Others may do so because of the proximity of other Church of England churches to their homes.These are St. Michael the Archangel at Great Sampford,St. Mary the Virgin at Great Bardfield,St. Katherine's at Little Bardfield and St. John's at Finchingfield.The Quakers attend the Friends' Meeting House at Great Bardfield;Baptists attend their chapel at Great Sampford;Roman Catholics the Chapel of the Holy Sepulchre at Bardfield and the non-conformists the United Reform Church at Finchingfield. Some go further afield to Saffron Walden or Thaxted.
